body_html:
It is at least somewhat confusing, since usually the failure more is that tensorflow doesn't install properly due to permission problems.

You don't have to uninstall anything, just make a virtualenv and install tensorflow in there.

body:
It is at least somewhat confusing, since usually the failure more is that tensorflow doesn't install properly due to permission problems. 

You don't have to uninstall anything, just make a virtualenv and install tensorflow in there.
